p: The average age of patients was 21 years, 54% were male, and 76% were Ladino ethnicity ( Table 2). Of cases and controls, 67% and 75% respectively cooked with firewood, 54% and 68% cooked with firewood at least five times per week, 32% and 53% cooked with firewood on an open hearth, and 2% and 7% cooked with firewood in the main house. Among all study participants who did not cook with firewood, 98% cooked with gas and 2% cooked with electricity.
